name: tsna3
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: sylibr(w0, wo(w1, wnan(w2, w1)), wo(w1, wn(wa(w2, w1))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(w1, wnan(w2, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wo(w1, wn(wa(w2, w1))))
-| wb(wo(w1, wnan(w2, w1)), wo(w1, wn(wa(w2, w1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(w1, wnan(w2, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wo(w1, wn(wa(w2, w1))))
-| wb(wo(w1, wnan(w2, w1)), wo(w1, wn(wa(w2, w1))))

|- wi(w0, wo(w1, wnan(w2, w1)))
-| wb(wo(w1, wnan(w2, w1)), wo(w1, wn(wa(w2, w1))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wo(w1, wnan(w2, w1)), wo(w1, wn(wa(w2, w1))))
-| wb(wnan(w2, w1), wn(wa(w2, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(w1, wnan(w2, w1)))
-| wb(wnan(w2, w1), wn(wa(w2, w1)))

comment: A Tseitin axiom for logical incompatibility, in deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 24-Mar-2018.)
